apiClassifier.shortdesc: PolygonClip extends MarkerClip to take the bounds of the marker into account when showing/hiding, and to trigger a redraw of content that needs scaling.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
PolygonClip extends MarkerClip to take the bounds of the marker into account when showing/hiding, and to trigger a redraw of content that needs scaling.
To trigger the redraw, markers must implement the Redrawable interface provided in this package.
See PolygonMarker for an example, but if you need multi-geometries, complex styling, holes etc., you'll need to write your own for the moment.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Polyline clip for rendering Polyline instances on your map.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Clips a line (passed as 2 points) to a rectangle.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Clips a line (passed as 2 points) to a rectangle. Returns true if the line is at all visible, false if not
Test for a line intersection. TODO - tidy up as no need to calc line equation twice

apiOperation.shortdesc: Update an individual polyline - determine its visibility and draw if so

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Update an individual polyline - determine its visibility and draw if so

apiOperation.shortdesc: Dispatches MarkerEvent.CLICK when a marker is clicked.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Dispatches MarkerEvent.CLICK when a marker is clicked.
The MarkerEvent includes a reference to the marker and its location.

apiOperation.shortdesc:
Dispatches MarkerEvent.ROLL_OUT
The MarkerEvent includes a reference to the marker and its location.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Dispatches MarkerEvent.ROLL_OUT
The MarkerEvent includes a reference to the marker and its location.

apiOperation.shortdesc:
Dispatches MarkerEvent.ROLL_OVER
The MarkerEvent includes a reference to the marker and its location.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Dispatches MarkerEvent.ROLL_OVER
The MarkerEvent includes a reference to the marker and its location.

apiOperation.shortdesc: call this if you've made a change to the underlying map geometry such that provider.locationCoordinate(location) will return a different coordinate

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: call this if you've made a change to the underlying map geometry such that provider.locationCoordinate(location) will return a different coordinate

apiOperation.shortdesc: This is the function provided to markers.sort() in order to determine which markers should go in front of the others.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: This is the function provided to markers.sort() in order to determine which markers should go in front of the others. The default behavior is to place markers further down on the screen (with higher y values) frontmost. You can modify this behavior by specifying a different value for MarkerClip.markerSortFunction

apiOperation.shortdesc: returns true if the marker was added to the stage, so that updateClips or attachMarker can sort the markers

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: returns true if the marker was added to the stage, so that updateClips or attachMarker can sort the markers

apiValue.shortdesc: if autoCache is true, we turn on cacheAsBitmap while panning, but off while zooming

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: if autoCache is true, we turn on cacheAsBitmap while panning, but off while zooming

apiValue.shortdesc: enable this if you want intermediate zooming steps to stretch your graphics instead of reprojecting the points it's useful for polygons, but for points it looks worse and probably isn't faster, but there it is :)

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: enable this if you want intermediate zooming steps to stretch your graphics instead of reprojecting the points it's useful for polygons, but for points it looks worse and probably isn't faster, but there it is :)

apiValue.shortdesc: if scaleZoom is true, this is how many zoom levels you can zoom by before things will be reprojected regardless

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: if scaleZoom is true, this is how many zoom levels you can zoom by before things will be reprojected regardless

apiClassifier.shortdesc: used by PolygonClip to trigger a redraw when zoom levels have changed substantially

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: used by PolygonClip to trigger a redraw when zoom levels have changed substantially

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Polyline class that takes polyline data and draws it in the given style.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Creates a polygon from the given array (or array of arrays) of Locations.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc:
Creates a polygon from the given array (or array of arrays) of Locations.
The polygon will use the given map to project the locations, and should be added to an instance of PolygonClip, which will add and remove it from the stage and position it as required.
If an array of arrays of Locations is given, the first array will be drawn as the outer ring of the polygon, and subsequent arrays will be treated as holes if they overlap it.
